Description:
This file contains the common structures and defines for the MobileTV DACOMMS API.


Platform:
Platform Independent

  • 1.0 1st Release




Define Documentation

#define DACOMMS_PACKET_PROTOCOL_SIZE

Value:

(sizeof( DACOMMSMsgHeader ) + /* Header */                      \
                                                                                        sizeof( IMG_UINT8 ) +            /* Message type */             \
                                                                                        sizeof( IMG_UINT32 ) +       /* Payload length */       \
                                                                                        2 * sizeof( IMG_UINT8 ) +        /* CRC */                              \
                                                                                        sizeof( DACOMMSMsgTrailer ))

Typedef Documentation

typedef union DACOMMS_tag_sStartMsg DACOMMS_sStartMsg

This structure defines the COMMS Start message format
